title: wine_Domaine_Zind-Humbrecht_2013_Hengst_Grand_Cru_Gewurztraminer_(Alsace)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 41413.
country: France.
description: The aromatics take time to come to the fore but they are definitely there: notes of lifted Poire William and ripe, golden-cheeked apricots are hinted at. The medium-sweet palate brings them out in full force, glowing with a ripe opulence tempered by freshness and a slight phenolic grip. There is a luminous quality to this wine, shining its way ahead into the future, guided by a seam of freshness and focus on the midpalate, echoing with bitter almond and more fruit. Drink 2016–2026..
designation: Hengst Grand Cru.
points: 94.
price: 90.0.
province: Alsace.
region_1: Alsace.
region_2: .
taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
taster_twitter_handle: @AnneInVino.
title: Domaine Zind-Humbrecht 2013 Hengst Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace).
